wikipedia_page.main:
Raheem Shaquille Rushan Hanley (born 24 February 1994) is professional footballer who plays as a left-back for Radcliffe. Born in England, he has represented Saint Kitts and Nevis internationally.
Hanley is an attacking left-back. He is also able to play in central midfield.

response: The club also confirmed that young players John O'Sullivan, Raheem Hanley, Hugo Fernandez, Will Beesley, Curtis Haley, Kellen Daly and Darragh Lenihan had all been offered new deals. All were due to be out of contract on 30 June 2013. Young goalkeeper Matthew Urwin and 1st team defender Grant Hanley also signed new contracts at the club.
